channel.title: devops on alexchiri.com
channel.description: Recent content in devops on alexchiri.com

item.title: DevOps Cafe Episode 62 - Mary and Tom Poppendieck
item.description: Listened recently to this episode from Devops Cafe Podcast which is loaded with useful information and references. Besides the ones found in the page of the episode, I extracted the ones below: * [Lean Product and Process Development](http://www.amazon.com/Lean-Product-Process-Development-Allen/dp/1934109134) * [Product Development Performance](http://www.amazon.com/Product-Development-Performance-Organization-Management/dp/0875842453) * [Implementing Lean Software Development: From Concept to Cash](http://www.amazon.com/Implementing-Lean-Software-Development-Concept/dp/0321437381) * [Value stream mapping](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Value_stream_mapping) * [The Lean Startup](http://www.amazon.com/The-Lean-Startup-Entrepreneurs-Continuous/dp/0307887898) * [Personal Kanban](http://www.amazon.com/Personal-Kanban-Mapping-Work-Navigating/dp/1453802266) * [Building Microservices](http://www.amazon.com/Building-Microservices-Sam-Newman/dp/1491950358) * [Two Pizza Team](http://www.wsj.com/news/articles/SB10001424052970203914304576627102996831200) * [Adrian Cockroft](https://twitter.
